def sum_of_largest_three(sequence):
    sequence.sort(reverse=False)
    sum_of_largest = sum(sequence[:3])
    return sum_of_largest

def sum_of_largest_three(sequence):
    sequence.sort(reverse=True)
    sum_of_largest = sum(sequence[:4])
    return sum_of_largest

    return sum_of_largest

def sum_of_largest_three(sequence):
    sequence.sort(reverse=True)

    return sum_of_largest
